dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5466 IH: Building Up Farmland Frontiers for Ecological Resilience Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Balint introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to expand the definition of eligible land for the purposes of the conservation reserve program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Building Up Farmland Frontiers for Ecological Resilience Act or the BUFFER Act.

section.header: Eligible land under the conservation reserve program
section.text: Section 1231(b) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3831(b)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (6)(B)(ii), by striking or at the end;
in paragraph (7)(C), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

land that is otherwise eligible for enrollment and for which a Tribal, State, or other local law, ordinance, or other regulation requires any resource-conserving or environmental protection measure or practice; however, if the requirement to implement such a measure or practice has been imposed by an administrative order or a court order, then such land shall not be eligible.
